title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 230/2002 of 7 February 2002 amending the export refunds on syrups and certain other sugar sector products exported in the natural state
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 230/2002
of 7 February 2002
amending the export refunds on syrups and certain other sugar sector products exported in the natural state
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1260/2001 of 19 June 2001 on the common organisation of the markets in the sugar sector(1), and in particular the third indent of Article 27(5) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The refunds on syrups and certain other sugar products were fixed by Commission Regulation (EC) No 184/2002(2).
(2) It follows from applying the rules, criteria and other provisions contained in Regulation (EC) No 184/2002 to the information at present available to the Commission that the export refunds at present in force should be altered as shown in the Annex hereto,
main_body: The refunds to be granted on the products listed in Article 1(1)(d), (f) and (g) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/2001, exported in the natural state, as fixed in the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 184/2002 are hereby altered to the amounts shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 8 February 2002.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 February 2002.
For the Commission
Franz Fischler
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 178, 30.6.2001, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 31, 1.2.2002, p. 34.
ANNEX
to the Commission Regulation of 7 February 2002 altering the export refunds on syrups and certain other sugar products exported in the natural state
>TABLE>
NB:
The product codes and the "A" series destination codes are set out in Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 (OJ L 366, 24.12.1987, p. 1) as amended.
The numeric destination codes are set out in Commission Regulation (EC) No 2020/2001 (OJ L 273, 16.10.2001, p. 6).
